entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 30%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Light snow beginning in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 29 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 05 March 2023
